page.title: 02Event on the river
page.content: On July 7th. there was a raft race from the Market carpark in Frome to Old Ford along the River Frome. I took part in the race with my two sisters. My dad built the raft and it took him four weeks. It was made from two chimney stacks filled with polystyrene and three oil cans. We had two practises before the race at different times. It was quite hard and the current was strong. There were three weirs to cross. The last one was very deep and the raft went floating off down the river because we could not hold it back. It got stuck on a rock and we got it back but we got very wet. Just before the end, someone threw a bucket of water over us as we went under a bridge. We came third and it was great fun. by Marcus Squires (l0)
